Class Area

java.lang.Object
Area
public class Area extends Object
The Area class represents the game area where the player moves and encounters creatures.

      public Area(int nAreaNum, int nRows, int nColumns, Inventory CInventory, Random CRandom, ArrayList<Creature> aCreatures, Utils CUtils, Scanner CScanner)
      Constructor to initialize the Area object.
      Parameters:
      nAreaNum - Number of area
      nRows - Number of rows in the area
      nColumns - Number of columns in the area
      CInventory - Inventory object
      CRandom - Random number generator
      aCreatures - ArrayList of creatures in the area
      CUtils - Utility object for game functionality
      CScanner - Scanner object for user input
